Name: New Apostolic Church Food Pantry

HOPE operates two pantries, the founding pantry is located in Lakewood, the most recent in Englewood. Individuals may visit our food pantry once a week. We provide bread, dairy products, fresh fruits and vegetables, meats and other non-perishable food items for FREE. Name: Bible Baptist Church Food Bank
Description:
Bible Baptist Church of Erie has 
expanded its home based missions in 
the form of a FOOD BANK. Check our website for hours. We are part of Weld County Food Bank and that is where 95% of our food 
comes from. We do purchase bread directly from a bread store in Denver 
and we do take donations as well as food drives!

Description:
The Connections 4 Life food pantry provides the most basic need of feeding the hungry. Life skills classes are then provided to help overcome the issues that brought them here.From the moment a family walks through the door, we are truly blessed to be able to help. We celebrate with them as they achieve their goals and climb above their circumstances.
